alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Ventura County Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 05 at 7:35PM PST until January 07 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST SATURDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph. For the High Wind Watch, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph possible. * WHERE...Southeastern Ventura County Valleys. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 7 AM PST Saturday. For the High Wind Watch, from Saturday evening through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
